name: Clamber (itch)
description:
Clamber as high as you can in this co-operative rock climbing game.
Best enjoyed with 2 or more players.
You'll be tethered to your friends, your rock holds will break under your weight and your tethered friends will have to try take your weight or be taken down with you.

Use the bumpers and triggers to grab, and the left analogue stick to move. 

Currently only set up to play with controllers, Xbox360 and XboxOne controllers will work with no setup. PS4 controllers will likely need to be set up with a program like DS4 before they'll work for you.

Have fun! Comment your scores!

Credits:

Hayley-Belle Cleverdon
Logan de Heer
Sarah Penrose

Music: Forest Noise by pborel - https://freesound.org/people/pborel/sounds/474342/
